name: Introduction to Humanities
description: An overview of the history, literature, art, music, philosophy, and other aspects of human culture.

name: History of Ancient Civilizations
description: A study of the civilizations that existed in the ancient world, including their political, social, and cultural development.

name: Classical Art and Architecture
description: A study of the art and architecture of ancient Greece and Rome.

name: Medieval History and Art
description: A study of the history and art of the Middle Ages.

name: Renaissance and Reformation History
description: A study of the history of the Renaissance and Reformation.

name: Modern History
description: A study of the history of the modern era, from the 17th century to the present day.
